description: In the Piedmontese dialect, “Argaj” translates as “satisfaction” and never has a restaurant name seemed more appropriate! In a simple, colourful and welcoming dining room with windows looking out at the hills, all the attention is on cuisine which is skilfully balanced between classic local dishes and more creative options. Choose between the à la carte and tasting menus, all accompanied by an excellent array of wines.
